short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-driven text analysis tools for processing and analyzing text from web pages, YouTube videos, and user input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension provides a powerful suite of AI-driven text analysis tools, leveraging models from Akash Network powered Llama 3.1 or Anthropics Claude . 

It offers various functionalities for processing and analyzing text from YouTube video transcripts, user input and more.

Ergonomic Shortcuts: CTRL-I to open the extension
